attributes.action: Before protecting or increasing overseas aid, give electorate detailed report on what the money has been spent on over the last financial year
attributes.additional_details:
The people of Britain are struggling financially.  The government is promising to protect the level of foreign aid.  We the electorate want to know how this money is spent, in detail, by the recipient countries, and how it is benefiting the poor and needy before it is protected, increased or even handed over, when cuts in pensions are hinted at to balance our budget.

We are frightened for our futures in the current situation.  We are the ones who need help from our hard earned taxes.  We should be protected and prioritised.  We as tax payers can't afford to  pay for other countries', especially when we see the political elite of those countries living in relative luxury.  Is that where our money goes?  We have a right to know if we are going to pay our money out to prop up other countries.
